title: Chess Help
description: Play a game of chess, where the goal is to checkmate the other player's king.

fields.title: Moving
fields.description: Use `wy!chess move from to` to move, where from and to are coordinates in a1 format.

fields.title: Castling
fields.description: Use `wy!chess move O-O` to castle Kingside, or `wy!chess move O-O-O` to castle Queenside.

fields.title: En Passant
fields.description: When capturing En Passant, just use the space your pawn will end up as the destination square.

fields.title: Style
fields.description:
There are different styles of boards you can use. Try `wy!chess set` and see which style reads the best.
Mobile devices may not see the colors.
